system.effect: The attack tears a painful rent in the target's face. If he is wearing a helmet, he suffers no ill effects; otherwise, he suffers 1 level of Fatigue.

description.value:
Rending Damage to Head (Severity 1)

The attack tears a painful rent in the target's face. If he is wearing a helmet, he suffers no ill effects; otherwise, he suffers 1 level of Fatigue.
